PROFILE

ABOUT ME

I am a front-end developer with 2 years of experience.

I am engaged in site layout and scripting.

My goal is to become a full-stack developer, so in my spare time I study new technologies for writing modern web applications. I am currently exploring MERN stack which includes Mongo DB, Express, React, Node js

You can see my works in the "Portfolio" section. Not all works are presented in this section.
